item.title: 6 Ways Technology is Improving the Lives of Refugees - Future Crunch
item.description:
6 Ways Technology is Improving the Lives of Refugees - Future Crunch

There's a long way to go in our efforts to solve the refugee crisis - but technology is helping create positive change Last month, the Syrian conflict entered its sixth year. More than 4.8 million people have fled since 2011, and around 13.5 million people are still in need of assistance to flee widespread violence, human rights abuses and the destruction of entire communities.

item.title: 11 Reasons Why 2015 Was a Great Year For Humanity - Future Crunch
item.description:
11 Reasons Why 2015 Was a Great Year For Humanity - Future Crunch

We are living through the most astonishing period of human progress in history. And nobody's telling us about it. As 2015 draws to a close, you'd be hard pressed to find anyone who'd claim that it's been a good year for the human race.
